Negative_Review: Needs updating room felt stuffy with poor air circulation
Positive_Review: Good location near metro line breakfast was good staff were great restaurant dinner was very good value

Negative_Review: Web site said it was in the heart of the left bank It was in reality far from the heart but in a residential district with zero store fronts exactly on the border of the 14th and 13 districts No bakeries cheese stores cafes and so forth It is also showing considerable signs of wear and tear Carpets need replacing interior of rooms have been painted and repainted multiple times and it shows Bath tub drain would not close nor if you could actually get it to close you had to call maintenance to open it again
Positive_Review: The staff was great

Negative_Review: One staff member Lisa I think was extremely rude I booked a double room for my girlfriend and I We were told only twin rooms were available unless we could prove we booked a twin Seemed to be some problem with booking com not saying what we booked She should not be working in customer service The Spanish women at reception was polite and really nice
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The toilet was very small and the food at breakfast and the conference could have been better
Positive_Review: I liked the ground floor restaurant and bar The room was functional and the bed was comfortable

Negative_Review: My shower leaked so the entire bathroom was soaked after every shower Really annoying My room was much too hot and I could not lower the temperature so I was too hot during the night Also I called ahead to ensure I could get an early check in of which I was assured in would get then had to wait over 3 hours in the lobby after a 10 hour flight to be given a room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I arrived at about 7 am after an overnight flight from the USA and had to wait over 2 hours to receive a room I had called days in advance to arrange early check in and when I arrived I was told check in was 3 pm which I knew which is why I had called in order to make arrangements
Positive_Review: Very fast room service and good food

Negative_Review: I cannot think of one thing I did not like in this hotel and I will certainly stay here when I come back to Paris
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and helpful specially at the front desk very accommodating about my questions regarding my Marriott card The newly furbished room I was given 822 was bright and had a good view of the street as well as the metro nearest metro Glaciere

Negative_Review: Too far out for easy sightseeing Breakfast was chaotic Servicing of room inconsistent and on one occasion not done by our return at 1600 So we had to shower with damp towels for a special evening out as no one around to get fresh ones Only went there because our American friends were booked in there for a conference Would not have chosen it otherwise
Positive_Review: Concierge and reception staff very helpful

Negative_Review: Loud music in foyer and bar on some occasions would seem to be staff who control it at a level they want Badly trained staff on the concierge desk who gave us 4 different locations for an evening bus tour all of which were WRONG Sloppy management
Positive_Review: Very little apart from Sabrina the reception manager Other staff should flow her example Completely misleading location it s 25 minute bus ride into Paris
